Notes: A black spiky blob-like enemy that remains stationary or moves on a path. It can be defeated by most of the player's attacks. It damages the player upon contact. The Orange Luma can freeze its movement.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: Specifies the movement speed. Default is 3.

Rail.Description: The path that it moves on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
